summary: Travel agency website and app for Shasvanth Tour's and Travels with cab booking, tour packages, train/bus/flight ticket booking. Needs custom logo and contact details integration.
architectural_notes: Multiple booking integrations required (cab, tours, train, bus, flight)
Custom branding with logo and business contact information
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Shasvanth Tours & Travels logo with colorful peacock design on left, temple icon above 'h', golden-yellow text for 'Shasvanth', red text for 'Tours & Travels', and red paper plane icon on right, transparent background (shasvanth-logo.dim_800x300.png)

existing_features.title: Display the Shasvanth Tours & Travels logo prominently in the website header and app navigation
Display contact phone number 6382281842 in the website footer and app contact section
Display contact email shasvanthtoursandtravels@gmail.com in the website footer and app contact section
Render the generated logo image as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated

new_feature_requests.summary: Add custom logo to website and app
